definition: The term "rechtzeitig" refers to the quality of an action or event occurring at an appropriate or suitable moment. It is commonly used to describe something happening in a timely manner, indicating that it takes place neither too early nor too late.

examples.english: I will arrive on time for the meeting.

examples.german: Bitte melde dich rechtzeitig ab, wenn du nicht kommen kannst.
examples.english: Please cancel in advance if you cannot come.

examples.german: Er hat rechtzeitig reagiert und den Fehler behoben.
examples.english: He reacted promptly and fixed the error.
